person.persName: John Ellis (Kenton County, Kentucky, farmer and politician)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, farmer and politician. Mason County, Kentucky, native. Son of Elijah Ellis and Phoebe Payton Ellis. Married to Mary H. Carlisle Ellis on August 15, 1839. Father of John F. Ellis, James D. Ellis, and Elijah P. Ellis. Teacher in Kenton County. Member of the Christian Church (Disciples of Christ) since 1845. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky as a Democrat from Kenton County from 1857 to 1861. Farmer in Kenton County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Kenton County in 1860. Member of the Masons. Common schools commissioner in Kenton County.
